disabled.comment: Background color for disabled state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

highlight.comment: Background color of highlight interactive color. Used on date range in Calendar

hover.comment: Background color for hover state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

off.comment: Background color for off state of UI Elements such as toggle

on.comment: Background color for on state of UI Elements such as toggle

active.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color.

default.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color

hover.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color.

active.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

default.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

hover.comment: Background color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

active.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Background color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

selected.comment: Background color for selected state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

selected-hover.comment: Background color for hover state of on selected UI Elements

disabled.comment: Border color for disabled state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

active.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color.

default.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color

hover.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color.

active.comment: Border color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

default.comment: Border color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

hover.comment: Border color of primary interactive color e.g primary buttons.

active.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Border color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

on-dark.comment: Border color for selected items on dark background.

focus-on-dark.comment: Outline color for focus state on dark backgrounds.

disabled-button.comment: Disabled state for buttons. Opacity at 50%

disabled-toggle.comment: Disabled state for toggles. Opacity at 25%

disabled-text-input.comment: Disabled state for text inputs. Opacity at 10%

active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons.

default.comment: Color of interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons

hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons.

active.comment: Color of primary interactive color on active  e.g. buttons

default.comment: Color of primary interactive color e.g. buttons

hover.comment: Color of primary interactive color on hover  e.g. buttons

active.comment: Color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

disabled.comment: Text color for disabled state of UI Elements

on-dark.comment: Text color on top of interactive color on a dark background

on-dark-active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

on-dark-default.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

on-dark-hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary button on a dark background

on-disabled.comment: Text color on top of disabled state color

on-hover.comment: Text color on top of hover state of UI Elements

on-primary.comment: Text color on top of primary interactive color

on-secondary.comment: Text color on top of secondary interactive color

on-selected.comment: Text color on top of selected state of UI Elements

on-selected-hover.comment: Text color on top of hover and selected state of UI Elements

active.comment: Text color of primary color pressed interactive state   e.g. ghost button

default.comment: Text color of primary interactive color e.g. links

hover.comment: Text color of primary color hover interactive state e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

default.comment: Main background color of the application.

gray-lightest.comment: Used on background of breadcrumb and pill components.

01.comment: Secondary background color of the application.

02.comment: Tertiary background color of the application.

on-dark.comment: Default Border color used for layout elements on a dark background.

on-light.comment: Default Border color used for layout elements e.g. accordion, table.

on-primary.comment: The text color on your primary brand color

on-secondary.comment: The text color on your secondary brand color

primary.comment: The primary color of your brand

secondary.comment: The secondary color of your brand

error-light.comment: Background color for error state of Light variation of notifications and toasts

information.comment: Background color for neutral or optional state

information-light.comment: Background color for neutral or optional state of Light variation of notifications and toasts

success.comment: Background color for success or positive state

success-light.comment: Background color for success or positive state for Light variation of notifications and toasts

error-light.comment: Border color for error state of Light variation of notifications and toasts

information.comment: Border color  for neutral or optional state

information-light.comment: Border color for neutral or optional state of Light variation of notifications and toasts

success.comment: Border color  for success or positive state

success-light.comment: Border color for success or positive state for Light variation of notifications and toasts

warning.comment: Border color or for warning state

error-light.comment: Color for light variant of error state

information.comment: Color for neutral or optional state

information-light.comment: Color for light variant of neutral or optional state

success.comment: Color for success or positive state

success-light.comment: Color for light variant of success or positive state

information.comment: Text color for neutral or optional state

on-error.comment: Text color displayed on top of the error color

on-error-light.comment: Text color displayed on top of the error color of Light variation of notifications and toasts

on-information.comment: Text color displayed on top of the error color

on-information-light.comment: Text color displayed on top of the information color of Light variation of notifications and toasts

on-success.comment: Text color displayed on top of the error color

on-success-light.comment: Text color displayed on top of the success color of Light variation of notifications and toasts

on-warning.comment: Text color displayed on top of the warning color

success.comment: Text color for success or positive state

on-dark.comment: Color of body text on dark background.

on-light.comment: Color of body text on light background.

helper.comment: Text color of helper text on forms, cards etc.

primary.comment: Text color of primary brand color.
